vocabulary.definition: A round fruit of a tree of the rose family, which typically has thin green or red skin and crisp flesh.
A long curved fruit that grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.
A berry, typically green, red, or purple, growing in clusters on a vine, used for making wine or eaten as fruit.
A round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind.
A sweet soft red fruit with a seed-studded surface.

exercises.question: Which fruit is yellow when ripe?
The color of a ripe orange is ______.
